alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 12:21AM EST until January 28 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Rouge River At Detroit affecting Wayne County. For the Rouge River...including Southfield, Detroit...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rouge River at Detroit. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest around 17 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1230 PM EST.
